AND type = '咨询'
GROUP BY word_name ORDER BY SUM(frequency_count))b on a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT *,SUM(frequency_count) as sumCount From tbl_ans_hotwords a WHERE statistical_date >= #{oldStartDate} and statistical_date <= #{oldEndDate}
